00048 // The dispatch handler
00049 static void TOHandler(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00050                       Time &current_time,
00051                       void (*to_function)(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &, Time &)) {
00052   return(to_function(cptr, current_time));
00053 }

00055 typedef void (*pt2TOFunction)(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &, Time &);
00056 pt2TOFunction TOFuncArray[NUM_TCP_STATES] =
00057   { &TONull,         // CLOSED
00058     &TONull,         // LISTEN
00059     &TOSynRcvd,      // SYN_RCVD
00060     &TOSynSent,      // SYN_SENT
00061     &TOSynSent1,     // SYN_SENT1
00062     &TOEstablished,  // ESTABLISHED
00063     &TOSendData,     // SEND_DATA
00064     &TOCloseWait,    // CLOSE_WAIT
00065     &TOFinWait1,     // FIN_WAIT1
00066     &TOClosing,      // CLOSING
00067     &TOLastAck,      // LAST_ACK
00068     &TONull,         // FIN_WAIT2
00069     &TOTimeWait      // TIME_WAIT
00070   };

00135 typedef void (*pt2DFIPFunction)(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &,
00136                                 TCPHeader &,
00137                                 Buffer &,
00138                                 Time &);
00139 pt2DFIPFunction DFIPFuncArray[NUM_TCP_STATES] =
00140   { &DFIPNull,         // CLOSED
00141     &DFIPNull,         // LISTEN *DFIPListen is not dispatched from this table*
00142     &DFIPSynRcvd,      // SYN_RCVD
00143     &DFIPSynSent,      // SYN_SENT
00144     &DFIPSynSent1,     // SYN_SENT1
00145     &DFIPEstablished,  // ESTABLISHED
00146     &DFIPSendData,     // SEND_DATA
00147     &DFIPCloseWait,    // CLOSE_WAIT
00148     &DFIPFinWait1,     // FIN_WAIT1
00149     &DFIPClosing,      // CLOSING
00150     &DFIPLastAck,      // LAST_ACK
00151     &DFIPFinWait2,     // FIN_WAIT2
00152     &DFIPTimeWait      // TIME_WAIT

00205 // Global memory
00206 MinetHandle ipmux;
00207 MinetHandle sock;
00208 ConnectionList<TCPState> clist;
00209 unsigned initSeqNum;
00210 
00211 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00212 {
00213   int rc;
00214   bool activetmr = false;
00215   initSeqNum=0;
00216   MinetEvent event;
00217   Time seqtime, two_msl;
00218 
00219   MinetInit(MINET_TCP_MODULE);
00220   ipmux = MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MUX) ? MinetConnect(MINET_IP_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00221   sock = MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00222 
00223   if (ipmux==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MUX)) {
00224     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't open connection to IP mux"));
00225     exit(-1);
00226   }
00227   if (sock==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE)) {
00228     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't open connection to sock module"));
00229     exit(-1);
00230   }
00231 
00232   cerr << "tcp_module operational\n";
00233   MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("tcp_module operational"));
00234 
00235   cerr << "tcp_module handling TCP traffic\n";
00236 
00237   // Initialize sequence time to current time, and initial sequence number to 0
00238   if (gettimeofday(&seqtime, 0) < 0) {
00239     cerr << "Can't obtain the current time.\n";
00240     exit(-1);
00241   }
00242 
00243   cerr << "The current time is: " << seqtime << endl;
00244   initSeqNum += (seqtime.tv_usec * MICROSEC_MULTIPLIER) & SEQ_LENGTH_MASK;
00245   initSeqNum += (seqtime.tv_sec * SECOND_MULTIPLIER) & SEQ_LENGTH_MASK;
00246   cerr << "The initial sequence number is: " << initSeqNum << endl;
00247 
00248   // Wait 2MSLs (4minutes) or 5 seconds as a hack before starting
00249   two_msl = seqtime;
00250   two_msl.tv_sec += 5;
00251   //two_msl.tv_sec += 2*MSL_TIME_SECS;
00252   while(two_msl > seqtime) {
00253     if (gettimeofday(&seqtime, 0) < 0) {
00254       cerr << "Can't obtain the current time.\n";
00255       exit(-1);
00256     }
00257   }
00258 
00259   cerr << "Starting main processing loop.\n\n";
00260   while (1) {
00261     Time current_time, select_timeout;
00262     if (gettimeofday(&current_time, 0) < 0) {
00263       cerr << "Can't obtain the current time.\n";
00264       exit(-1);
00265     }
00266 
00267 
00268     initSeqNum = UpdateSequenceNumber(current_time, seqtime, initSeqNum);
00269     cerr << "Current sequence number is: " << initSeqNum << endl;
00270 
00271     activetmr = GetNextTimeoutValue(current_time, select_timeout);
00272     cerr << "select timeout: " << (double)select_timeout << endl;
00273 
00274     if(activetmr == false) {
00275       cerr << "Active timer is FALSE." << endl;
00276       rc=MinetGetNextEvent(event);
00277     } else {
00278       cerr << "Active timer is TRUE." << endl;
00279       rc=MinetGetNextEvent(event,(double)select_timeout);
00280     }
00281 
00282     if (rc<0) {
00283       break;
00284     } else if (event.eventtype==MinetEvent::Timeout) {
00285       cerr << "TIMEOUT EVENT." << endl;
00286 
00287       // Handle all connections that have incurred a timeout
00288       ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator next = clist.FindEarliest();
00289       while(((*next).timeout < current_time) && (next != clist.end())) {
00290         cerr << "TIMEOUT LOOP." << endl;
00291 
00292         if (gettimeofday(&current_time, 0) < 0) {
00293           cerr << "Can't obtain the current time.\n";
00294           exit(-1);
00295         }
00296 
00297         // Check the state of each timed out connection
00298         TOHandler(next, current_time, TOFuncArray[(*next).state.GetState()]);
00299         next = clist.FindEarliest();
00300       }
00301     } else if (event.eventtype==MinetEvent::Dataflow && event.direction==MinetEvent::IN) {
00302 
00303       if (event.handle==ipmux) {
00304         cerr << "DATAFLOW IP EVENT." << endl;
00305 
00306         if (gettimeofday(&current_time, 0) < 0) {
00307           cerr << "Can't obtain the current time.\n";
00308           exit(-1);
00309         }
00310 
00311         TCPHeader tcph;
00312         Connection c;
00313         Buffer data;
00314         if ( ExtractInfoFromIPPacket(tcph, c, data) ) {
00315 
00316           ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(c);
00317           if(cs != clist.end()) {
00318 
00319             if ((*cs).state.GetState() == LISTEN) {
00320               // May need to create a new connection based on incoming packet
00321               DFIPListen(tcph, c, current_time);
00322             } else {
00323               unsigned short window;
00324               tcph.GetWinSize(window);
00325               (*cs).state.SetSendRwnd(window);
00326               DFIPHandler(cs,
00327                           tcph,
00328                           data,
00329                           current_time,
00330                           DFIPFuncArray[(*cs).state.GetState()]);
00331             }
00332           }
00333         }
00334       }
00335 
00336       if (event.handle==sock) {
00337         cerr << "DATAFLOW SOCK EVENT." << endl;
00338         SockRequestResponse req;
00339         MinetReceive(sock,req);
00340         DFSOCKHandler(req, DFSOCKFuncArray[req.type]);
00341       }
00342     }
00343   }
00344   MinetDeinit();
00345   return 0;
00346 }
00347 
00348 
00349 // Timeout dispatch functions
00350 void TONull(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr, Time &current_time) {
00351   (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00352   (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00353 }
00354 
00355 void TOSynSent(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr, Time &current_time) {
00356   // Decrement the number of tries and resend the SYN
00357   if((*cptr).state.ExpireTimerTries()) {
00358         debug(1) << "tcp_module: Connection failed (number of retries expired for resending SYN)" << std::endl;
00359     ConnectionFailed(cptr);
00360   } else {
00361     SendSyn(cptr);
00362     (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00363     (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00364   }
00365 }
00366 
00367 void TOSynSent1(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr, Time &current_time) {
00368   //Timeout here implies that we never received a proper SYN after
00369   // receiving an ACK
00370   if((*cptr).state.ExpireTimerTries()) {
00371         debug(1) << "tcp_module: Connection failed (did not receive a proper SYN after receiving an ACK)" << std::endl;
00372     ConnectionFailed(cptr);
00373   } else {
00374     (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00375     (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00376   }
00377 }
00378 
00379 void TOSynRcvd(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr, Time &current_time) {
00380   //Timeout here implies that we sent a SYN/ACK but that we
00381   // have not received an ACK from the remote side.  Here we
00382   // should resend the SYN/ACK packet.
00383   SendSynAck(cptr);
00384   (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00385   (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00386 }
00387 
00388 void TOEstablished(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr, Time &current_time) {
00389   if ((*cptr).state.SendBuffer.GetSize()) {
00390     (*cptr).state.SetLastSent((*cptr).state.GetLastAcked());
00391     SendData(cptr);
00392   }
00393   (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00394   (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00395 }
00396 
00397 void TOSendData(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr, Time &current_time) {
00398   if ((*cptr).state.SendBuffer.GetSize()) {
00399     (*cptr).state.SetLastSent((*cptr).state.GetLastAcked());
00400     SendData(cptr);
00401   }
00402   (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00403   (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00404 }
00405 
00406 void TOCloseWait(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr, Time &current_time) {
00407 
00408 #if SIM_PASSIVE_CLOSE==1
00409   //Simulate receiving the close from the application
00410   SendFin(cptr);
00411   (*cptr).state.SetState(LAST_ACK);
00412 
00413 #else
00414   // Send a zero byte write to ask sock for the close signal
00415   SockRequestResponse write(WRITE,
00416                             (*cptr).connection,
00417                             (*cptr).state.RecvBuffer,
00418                             0,
00419                             EOK);
00420   MinetSend(sock,write);
00421 #endif
00422 
00423   (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00424   (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00425 }
00426 
00427 void TOClosing(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr, Time &current_time) {
00428   // Resend the ACK, since we are waiting for an ACK from the other
00429   //  side
00430   SendAck(cptr);
00431   (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00432   (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00433 }
00434 
00435 void TOLastAck(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr, Time &current_time) {
00436   // Timeout here, means we haven't received an ACK or FIN/ACK, and
00437   // must resend a FIN packet
00438   SendFin(cptr);
00439   (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00440   (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00441 }
00442 
00443 void TOFinWait1(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr, Time &current_time) {
00444   // Timeout here, means we haven't received an ACK, FIN or FIN/ACK, and
00445   // must resend a FIN packet
00446   SendFin(cptr);
00447   (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00448   (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00449 }
00450 
00451 void TOTimeWait(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr, Time &current_time) {
00452   //Remove connection from connection list
00453   cerr << "Erasing connection: " << *cptr << endl << endl;
00454   clist.erase(cptr);
00455   PrintConnectionList();
00456 }
00457 
00458 // IP dataflow dispatch functions
00459 void DFIPNull(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00460               TCPHeader &tcph,
00461               Buffer &data,
00462               Time &current_time) {}
00463 
00464 void DFIPListen(TCPHeader &tcph, Connection &c, Time &current_time) {
00465   cerr << "LISTEN: New connection came in: " << c << endl;
00466   unsigned char flags=0;
00467   tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00468   if(IS_SYN(flags)) {
00469     //Store remote side sequence number and connection
00470     // information with a new connection, send SYN/ACK
00471     // with my sequence number
00472     unsigned int seqnum;
00473     tcph.GetSeqNum(seqnum);
00474 
00475     Connection cnew = c;
00476 
00477     Time newto = current_time;
00478     newto.tv_sec += 5;
00479     TCPState newtcp(initSeqNum, SYN_RCVD, 8);
00480     newtcp.SetLastRecvd(seqnum);
00481     ConnectionToStateMapping<TCPState> csm(cnew, newto, newtcp, true);
00482     clist.push_front(csm);  //Add new connection to list
00483 
00484     ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(cnew);
00485 
00486     unsigned short window;
00487     tcph.GetWinSize(window);
00488     (*cs).state.SetSendRwnd(window);
00489 
00490     if(cs == clist.end()) {
00491       cerr << "Some problem finding the newly inserted tuple" << endl;
00492     }
00493 
00494     SendSynAck(cs);
00495   }
00496 }
00497 
00498 void DFIPSynRcvd(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00499                  TCPHeader &tcph,
00500                  Buffer &data,
00501                  Time &current_time) {
00502   cerr << "SYN_RCVD" << endl;
00503   unsigned char flags=0;
00504   tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00505   if(IS_ACK(flags)) {
00506     //Send nothing and progress to ESTABLISHED state if valid ACK
00507     unsigned int ack;
00508     tcph.GetAckNum(ack);
00509     if((*cptr).state.SetLastAcked(ack)) {
00510 
00511       (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00512       (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00513 
00514       //Change state
00515       (*cptr).state.SetState(ESTABLISHED);
00516 
00517       //Indicate to sock that connection established properly
00518       SockRequestResponse repl;
00519       repl.type=WRITE;
00520       repl.connection=(*cptr).connection;
00521       repl.bytes=0;
00522       repl.error=EOK;
00523       MinetSend(sock,repl);
00524     }
00525   } else if(IS_SYN(flags)) {
00526     //Store remote side sequence number and connection
00527     // information with a new connection, send SYN/ACK
00528     // with my sequence number.  If we get here, we recvd
00529     // another syn before timing out.
00530     unsigned int seqnum;
00531     tcph.GetSeqNum(seqnum);
00532 
00533     (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00534     (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00535 
00536     (*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum);
00537 
00538     SendSynAck(cptr);
00539 
00540   } else if(IS_RST(flags)) {
00541     unsigned int seqnum;
00542     tcph.GetSeqNum(seqnum);
00543     if((*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum,data.GetSize())) {
00544       cerr << "Erasing connection: " << *cptr << endl << endl;
00545       clist.erase(cptr);
00546       PrintConnectionList();
00547     }
00548   }
00549 }
00550 
00551 void DFIPSynSent(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00552                  TCPHeader &tcph,
00553                  Buffer &data,
00554                  Time &current_time) {
00555   cerr << "SYN_SENT" << endl;
00556   unsigned char flags=0;
00557   tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00558   if(IS_SYN(flags) && IS_ACK(flags)) {
00559     // Check if ACK valid and store info if okay
00560     unsigned int ack;
00561     tcph.GetAckNum(ack);
00562     if((*cptr).state.SetLastAcked(ack)) {
00563       unsigned int seqnum;
00564       tcph.GetSeqNum(seqnum);
00565       (*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum);
00566 
00567       SendAck(cptr);
00568 
00569       //Create an idle connection timeout
00570       (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00571       (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00572 
00573       //Change state
00574       (*cptr).state.SetState(ESTABLISHED);
00575 
00576       //Indicate to sock that connection established properly
00577       SockRequestResponse repl;
00578       repl.type=WRITE;
00579       repl.connection=(*cptr).connection;
00580       repl.bytes=0;
00581       repl.error=EOK;
00582       MinetSend(sock,repl);
00583     }
00584   } else if (IS_SYN(flags)) {
00585     //Store remote side sequence number and connection
00586     // information with a new connection, send SYN/ACK
00587     // with my sequence number
00588     unsigned int seqnum;
00589     tcph.GetSeqNum(seqnum);
00590 
00591     (*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum);
00592 
00593     unsigned short window;
00594     tcph.GetWinSize(window);
00595     (*cptr).state.SetSendRwnd(window);
00596 
00597     SendSynAck(cptr);
00598 
00599     (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00600     (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00601 
00602     //Change state
00603     (*cptr).state.SetState(SYN_RCVD);
00604 
00605   } else if (IS_ACK(flags) && !IS_SYN(flags)) {
00606     // Check if ACK valid and store info if okay
00607     unsigned int ack;
00608     tcph.GetAckNum(ack);
00609     if((*cptr).state.SetLastAcked(ack)) {
00610       (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00611       (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00612 
00613       //Change state to SYN_SENT1, waits for SYN
00614       (*cptr).state.SetState(SYN_SENT1);
00615     }
00616   }
00617 }
00618 
00619 void DFIPSynSent1(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00620                   TCPHeader &tcph,
00621                   Buffer &data,
00622                   Time &current_time) {
00623   cerr << "SYN_SENT1" << endl;
00624   unsigned char flags=0;
00625   tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00626   if(!IS_ACK(flags) && IS_SYN(flags)) {
00627     //Send ACK back, and send connection established
00628     // back to sock
00629 
00630     unsigned int seqnum;
00631     tcph.GetSeqNum(seqnum);
00632     (*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum);
00633 
00634     SendAck(cptr);
00635 
00636     //Create a new connection with a timeout to receive the SYN/ACK
00637     (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00638     (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00639 
00640     //Indicate to sock that connection established properly
00641     SockRequestResponse repl;
00642     repl.type=WRITE;
00643     repl.connection=(*cptr).connection;
00644     repl.bytes=0;
00645     repl.error=EOK;
00646     MinetSend(sock,repl);
00647 
00648     (*cptr).state.SetState(ESTABLISHED);
00649   }
00650 }
00651 
00652 void DFIPEstablished(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00653                      TCPHeader &tcph,
00654                      Buffer &data,
00655                      Time &current_time) {
00656   cerr << "ESTABLISHED" << endl;
00657   unsigned int seqnum;
00658   tcph.GetSeqNum(seqnum);
00659   if((*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum,data.GetSize())) {
00660 
00661     unsigned char flags=0;
00662     tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00663 
00664     if(IS_ACK(flags)) {
00665       unsigned int ack;
00666       tcph.GetAckNum(ack);
00667       if((*cptr).state.SetLastAcked(ack)) {
00668 
00669         if(IS_FIN(flags) && data.GetSize()==0) {
00670           (*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum);
00671 
00672           //GO TO CLOSE_WAIT STATE
00673           (*cptr).state.SetState(CLOSE_WAIT);
00674 
00675           (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00676           (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 20;
00677 
00678           //Send a zero byte read to sock
00679           SockRequestResponse write(WRITE,
00680                                     (*cptr).connection,
00681                                     (*cptr).state.RecvBuffer,
00682                                     0,
00683                                     EOK);
00684           MinetSend(sock,write);
00685           SendAck(cptr);
00686         } else {
00687           if(data.GetSize()) {
00688             //Put the payload into the receive buffer
00689             (*cptr).state.RecvBuffer.AddBack(data);
00690 
00691             //Send the new data up to the sock layer
00692             SockRequestResponse write(WRITE,
00693                                       (*cptr).connection,
00694                                       (*cptr).state.RecvBuffer,
00695                                       (*cptr).state.RecvBuffer.GetSize(),
00696                                       EOK);
00697             MinetSend(sock,write);
00698             SendAck(cptr);
00699           }
00700         }
00701       }
00702     }
00703   }
00704 }
00705 
00706 
00707 void DFIPSendData(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00708                   TCPHeader &tcph,
00709                   Buffer &data,
00710                   Time &current_time) {
00711   cerr << "SEND_DATA" << endl;
00712 
00713   // If incoming data comes in, we must send a reset
00714   if (data.GetSize() > 0) {
00715     SendRst(cptr);
00716   } else {
00717     unsigned char flags=0;
00718     tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00719 
00720     if(IS_ACK(flags)) {
00721       unsigned int ack;
00722       tcph.GetAckNum(ack);
00723       if(((*cptr).state.SetLastAcked(ack))&&
00724          ((*cptr).state.SendBuffer.GetSize()==0)) {
00725 
00726         SendFin(cptr);
00727         (*cptr).state.SetState(FIN_WAIT1);
00728       }
00729     }
00730   }
00731   (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00732   (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00733 }
00734 
00735 void DFIPCloseWait(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00736                  TCPHeader &tcph,
00737                  Buffer &data,
00738                  Time &current_time) {
00739   cerr << "CLOSE_WAIT" << endl;
00740   unsigned char flags=0;
00741   tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00742 
00743   if(IS_FIN(flags)) {
00744     //Change the last received up by 1 since we have
00745     // received a FIN.  This is like receiving 1 Byte
00746 
00747     //(*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum);
00748     SendAck(cptr);
00749 
00750     (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00751     (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00752   }
00753 }
00754 
00755 
00756 void DFIPFinWait1(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00757                   TCPHeader &tcph,
00758                   Buffer &data,
00759                   Time &current_time) {
00760   cerr << "FIN_WAIT1" << endl;
00761 
00762   unsigned int seqnum;
00763   tcph.GetSeqNum(seqnum);
00764   if((*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum,data.GetSize())) {
00765     unsigned char flags=0;
00766     unsigned int ack;
00767     tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00768     tcph.GetAckNum(ack);
00769 
00770     if(IS_ACK(flags)&&IS_FIN(flags)&&(*cptr).state.SetLastAcked(ack-1)) {
00771       // ACK uses up one sequence number
00772       (*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum);
00773       SendAck(cptr);
00774 
00775       //Go to TIME_WAIT state and wait 2MSL times
00776       (*cptr).state.SetState(TIME_WAIT);
00777 
00778       (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00779       //(*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 2*MSL_TIME_SECS;
00780       (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 20;
00781     }
00782     else if(IS_ACK(flags)) {
00783       if((*cptr).state.SetLastAcked(ack-1)) {
00784 
00785         //GO TO FIN_WAIT2
00786         (*cptr).state.SetState(FIN_WAIT2);
00787       }
00788       (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00789       (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00790     }
00791     else if(IS_FIN(flags)) {
00792       // ACK uses up one sequence number
00793       (*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum);
00794       SendAck(cptr);
00795 
00796       //GO TO CLOSING STATE
00797       (*cptr).state.SetState(CLOSING);
00798 
00799       (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00800       (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
00801     }
00802   }
00803 }
00804 
00805 void DFIPClosing(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00806                  TCPHeader &tcph,
00807                  Buffer &data,
00808                  Time &current_time) {
00809   cerr << "CLOSING" << endl;
00810 
00811   unsigned char flags=0;
00812   tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00813   if(IS_ACK(flags)) {
00814     //Send nothing and close connection if valid ACK
00815     unsigned int ack;
00816     tcph.GetAckNum(ack);
00817     if((*cptr).state.SetLastAcked(ack-1)) {
00818       (*cptr).state.SetState(TIME_WAIT);
00819 
00820       //Go to TIME_WAIT state and wait 2MSL times
00821       (*cptr).state.SetState(TIME_WAIT);
00822 
00823       (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00824       //(*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 2*MSL_TIME_SECS;
00825       (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 20;
00826     }
00827   }
00828 }
00829 
00830 void DFIPLastAck(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00831                  TCPHeader &tcph,
00832                  Buffer &data,
00833                  Time &current_time) {
00834   cerr << "LAST_ACK" << endl;
00835   unsigned char flags=0;
00836   tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00837   if(IS_ACK(flags)) {
00838     //Send nothing and close connection if valid ACK
00839     unsigned int ack;
00840     tcph.GetAckNum(ack);
00841     if((*cptr).state.SetLastAcked(ack-1)) {
00842       cerr << "Erasing connection: " << *cptr << endl << endl;
00843       clist.erase(cptr);
00844       PrintConnectionList();
00845     }
00846   }
00847 }
00848 
00849 void DFIPFinWait2(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00850                   TCPHeader &tcph,
00851                   Buffer &data,
00852                   Time &current_time) {
00853   cerr << "FIN_WAIT2" << endl;
00854 
00855   unsigned int seqnum;
00856   tcph.GetSeqNum(seqnum);
00857   if((*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum,data.GetSize())) {
00858     unsigned char flags=0;
00859     tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00860 
00861     if(IS_FIN(flags)) {
00862       // ACK uses up one sequence number
00863       (*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum);
00864       SendAck(cptr);
00865 
00866       //Go to TIME_WAIT state and wait 2MSL times
00867       (*cptr).state.SetState(TIME_WAIT);
00868 
00869       (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00870       //(*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 2*MSL_TIME_SECS;
00871       (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 20;
00872     }
00873   }
00874 }
00875 
00876 static void DFIPTimeWait(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &cptr,
00877                          TCPHeader &tcph,
00878                          Buffer &data,
00879                          Time &current_time) {
00880   cerr << "TIME_WAIT" << endl;
00881 
00882   unsigned int seqnum;
00883   tcph.GetSeqNum(seqnum);
00884   if((*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum+1,0)) {
00885     (*cptr).state.SetLastRecvd(seqnum);
00886     unsigned char flags=0;
00887     tcph.GetFlags(flags);
00888 
00889     if(IS_FIN(flags)) {
00890       SendAck(cptr);
00891     }
00892 
00893     (*cptr).timeout = current_time;
00894     //(*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 2*MSL_TIME_SECS;
00895     (*cptr).timeout.tv_sec += 20;
00896   }
00897 }
00898 
00899 // Sock dataflow dispatch functions
00900 void DFSOCKConnect(SockRequestResponse &req) {
00901   cerr << "Got a CONNECT request." << endl;
00902 
00903   Time current_time;
00904   if (gettimeofday(&current_time, 0) < 0) {
00905     cerr << "Can't obtain the current time.\n";
00906     exit(-1);
00907   }
00908 
00909   ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator cs =
00910     clist.FindMatching(req.connection);
00911 
00912   if(cs == clist.end()) {
00913     cerr << "Creating new connection." << endl;
00914     //Create a new connection with a timeout to receive the SYN/ACK
00915     Connection cnew = req.connection;
00916 
00917     Time newto = current_time;
00918     newto.tv_sec += 5;
00919 
00920     TCPState newtcp(initSeqNum, SYN_SENT, 8);
00921     ConnectionToStateMapping<TCPState> csm(cnew, newto, newtcp, true);
00922     clist.push_front(csm);  //Add new connection to list
00923   }
00924 
00925   cs = clist.FindMatching(req.connection);
00926   if(cs == clist.end()) {
00927     cerr << "Some problem finding the newly inserted tuple" << endl;
00928   }
00929   SendSyn(cs);
00930 
00931   //Send back result code
00932   SockRequestResponse repl;
00933   repl.type=STATUS;
00934   repl.connection=req.connection;
00935   repl.bytes=0;
00936   repl.error=EOK;
00937   MinetSend(sock,repl);
00938 }
00939 
00940 void DFSOCKAccept(SockRequestResponse &req) {
00941   cerr << "Got an ACCEPT request." << endl;
00942 
00943   //Perform the passive open with timeout zeroed, and timer inactive
00944   Connection cnew = req.connection;
00945 
00946   cerr << req.connection << endl;
00947 
00948   ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(req.connection);
00949   if(cs == clist.end()) {
00950     Time newto(0,0);  //Set timeout to zero
00951     TCPState newtcp(0, LISTEN, 0);
00952     ConnectionToStateMapping<TCPState> csm(cnew, newto, newtcp, false);
00953     clist.push_back(csm);  //Add new connection to list
00954   }
00955 
00956   //Send back result code
00957   SockRequestResponse repl;
00958   repl.type=STATUS;
00959   repl.connection = req.connection;
00960   repl.bytes=0;
00961   repl.error=EOK;
00962   MinetSend(sock,repl);
00963 }
00964 
00965 void DFSOCKWrite(SockRequestResponse &req) {
00966   cerr << "Got a WRITE request." << endl;
00967 
00968   Time current_time;
00969   if (gettimeofday(&current_time, 0) < 0) {
00970     cerr << "Can't obtain the current time.\n";
00971     exit(-1);
00972   }
00973 
00974   //Check if connection in list
00975   ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(req.connection);
00976 
00977   if(cs != clist.end()) {
00978     switch((*cs).state.GetState()) {
00979     case ESTABLISHED:
00980       {
00981         //Connection in list and in ESTABLISHED state
00982 
00983         //Get the size of bytes the application wants queued
00984         unsigned int datasize = req.data.GetSize();
00985 
00986         //Create result code
00987         SockRequestResponse repl;
00988         repl.type=STATUS;
00989         repl.connection=req.connection;
00990         repl.bytes = datasize;
00991         repl.error=EOK;
00992         MinetSend(sock,repl);
00993 
00994         if (datasize) {
00995           //Add bytes to send buffer
00996           (*cs).state.SendBuffer.AddBack(req.data);
00997 
00998           //(*cs).state.SetLastSent((*cs).state.GetLastAcked());
00999           SendData(cs);
01000         }
01001 
01002         //Enable the timeout
01003         (*cs).bTmrActive = true;
01004 
01005         //Update the timeout.  Should be factored using RTT, but for
01006         // simplicity we will use 10 seconds
01007         (*cs).timeout = current_time;
01008         (*cs).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
01009       }
01010       break;
01011     case LISTEN:
01012       {
01013         //Create a new connection with a timeout to receive the SYN/ACK
01014         Connection cnew = req.connection;
01015 
01016         Time newto = current_time;
01017         newto.tv_sec += 5;
01018         TCPState newtcp(initSeqNum, SYN_SENT, 8);
01019         ConnectionToStateMapping<TCPState> csm(cnew, newto, newtcp, true);
01020         clist.push_front(csm);  //Add new connection to list
01021 
01022         cs = clist.FindMatching(req.connection);
01023         if(cs == clist.end()) {
01024           cerr << "Some problem finding the newly inserted tuple" << endl;
01025         }
01026 
01027         SendSyn(cs);
01028 
01029         //Send back result code
01030         SockRequestResponse repl;
01031         repl.type=STATUS;
01032         repl.connection=req.connection;
01033         repl.bytes=0;
01034         repl.error=EOK;
01035         MinetSend(sock,repl);
01036       }
01037       break;
01038     default:
01039       SockRequestResponse repl;
01040       repl.type=STATUS;
01041       repl.bytes=0;
01042       repl.error=EINVALID_OP;
01043       MinetSend(sock,repl);
01044     }
01045   } else {
01046     SockRequestResponse repl;
01047     repl.type=STATUS;
01048     repl.bytes=0;
01049     repl.error=ENOMATCH;
01050     MinetSend(sock,repl);
01051   }
01052 }
01053 
01054 void DFSOCKForward(SockRequestResponse &req) {
01055   cerr << "Got a FORWARD request." << endl;
01056 
01057   //Message ignored, but Send back result code
01058   SockRequestResponse repl;
01059   repl.type=STATUS;
01060   repl.error=EOK;
01061   MinetSend(sock,repl);
01062 }
01063 
01064 void DFSOCKClose(SockRequestResponse &req) {
01065   cerr << "Got a CLOSE request." << endl;
01066 
01067   //Received a CLOSE request from Sock Layer
01068   //Create a FIN packet
01069   ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(req.connection);
01070 
01071   if(cs == clist.end()) {
01072     SockRequestResponse repl;
01073     repl.type = STATUS;
01074     repl.error = ENOMATCH;
01075     MinetSend(sock,repl);
01076 
01077   } else if (((*cs).state.GetState() == ESTABLISHED) ||
01078              ((*cs).state.GetState() == CLOSE_WAIT)) {
01079 
01080     if((*cs).state.SendBuffer.GetSize()) {
01081       // Need to make sure that all data is acked before sending the FIN
01082       // This is taken care of in the SEND_DATA state
01083       (*cs).state.SetState(SEND_DATA);
01084     } else {
01085       SendFin(cs);
01086 
01087       if((*cs).state.GetState() == ESTABLISHED) {
01088         (*cs).state.SetState(FIN_WAIT1);
01089       } else if((*cs).state.GetState() == CLOSE_WAIT) {
01090         (*cs).state.SetState(LAST_ACK);
01091       }
01092     }
01093 
01094   } else if ((*cs).state.GetState() == SYN_RCVD) {
01095     SendFin(cs);
01096     (*cs).state.SetState(FIN_WAIT1);
01097   } else if ((*cs).state.GetState() == SYN_SENT) {
01098     // Send connection failed to client and remove from list
01099     ConnectionFailed(cs);
01100   } else {
01101     SockRequestResponse repl;
01102     repl.type = STATUS;
01103     repl.error = EINVALID_OP;
01104     MinetSend(sock,repl);
01105   }
01106 
01107   Time timenow;
01108   if (gettimeofday(&timenow, 0) < 0) {
01109     cerr << "Can't obtain the current time.\n";
01110     exit(-1);
01111   }
01112   (*cs).timeout = timenow;
01113   (*cs).timeout.tv_sec += 5;
01114 }
01115 
01116 void DFSOCKStatus(SockRequestResponse &req) {
01117   cerr << "Got a STATUS request." << endl;
01118 
01119   ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator cs = clist.FindMatching(req.connection);
01120 
01121   if(cs == clist.end()) {
01122     SockRequestResponse repl;
01123     repl.type = STATUS;
01124     repl.error = ENOMATCH;
01125     MinetSend(sock,repl);
01126 
01127   } else if (((*cs).state.GetState() == ESTABLISHED) ||
01128              ((*cs).state.GetState() == CLOSE_WAIT) ||
01129              ((*cs).state.GetState() == SEND_DATA)){
01130     //Erase this many bytes from the receive buffer
01131     (*cs).state.RecvBuffer.Erase(0, req.bytes);
01132 
01133     if(req.bytes < (*cs).state.RecvBuffer.GetSize()) {
01134       //Attempt to send the remaining bytes
01135       SockRequestResponse write(WRITE,
01136                                 (*cs).connection,
01137                                 (*cs).state.RecvBuffer,
01138                                 (*cs).state.RecvBuffer.GetSize(),
01139                                 EOK);
01140 
01141       MinetSend(sock,write);
01142     }
01143   }
01144 }
01145 
01146 // Worker Functions
01147 void SendSyn(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &ptr) {
01148   cerr << "Sending a SYN packet." << endl;
01149 
01150   unsigned char flags=0;
01151   SET_SYN(flags);
01152   Packet p = CreatePacket(ptr, flags);
01153   MinetSend(ipmux,p);
01154 }
01155 
01156 void SendFin(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &ptr) {
01157   cerr << "Sending a FIN packet." << endl;
01158 
01159   //Create a FIN packet
01160   unsigned char flags=0;
01161   SET_FIN(flags);
01162   SET_ACK(flags);
01163   Packet p = CreatePacket(ptr, flags);
01164   MinetSend(ipmux,p);
01165 }
01166 
01167 void SendSynAck(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &ptr) {
01168   cerr << "Sending a SYN/ACK packet." << endl;
01169 
01170   //Create a SYN/ACK packet
01171   unsigned char flags=0;
01172   SET_SYN(flags);
01173   SET_ACK(flags);
01174   Packet p = CreatePacket(ptr, flags);
01175   MinetSend(ipmux,p);
01176 }
01177 
01178 void SendAck(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &ptr) {
01179   cerr << "Sending an ACK packet." << endl;
01180 
01181   //Create an ACK packet
01182   unsigned char flags=0;
01183   SET_ACK(flags);
01184   Packet p = CreatePacket(ptr, flags);
01185   MinetSend(ipmux,p);
01186 }
01187 
01188 void SendRst(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &ptr) {
01189   cerr << "Sending a RST packet." << endl;
01190 
01191   //Create a RST packet
01192   unsigned char flags=0;
01193   SET_RST(flags);
01194   SET_ACK(flags);
01195   Packet p = CreatePacket(ptr, flags);
01196   MinetSend(ipmux,p);
01197 }
01198 
01199 
01200 void SendData(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &ptr) {
01201   unsigned datasize = (*ptr).state.SendBuffer.GetSize();
01202 
01203   unsigned char flags=0;
01204   SET_PSH(flags);
01205   SET_ACK(flags);
01206 
01207   if(datasize > 0) {
01208     //Resend some data packets
01209     unsigned int bytesize;
01210     Packet p = CreatePayloadPacket(ptr, bytesize, datasize, flags);
01211     MinetSend(ipmux,p);
01212 
01213     //Create packets until bytesize becomes 0
01214     while(1) {
01215       datasize -= bytesize;
01216       if(datasize == 0)
01217         break;
01218 
01219       Packet p = CreatePayloadPacket(ptr, bytesize, datasize, flags);
01220       MinetSend(ipmux,p);
01221     }
01222   }
01223 }
01224 
01225 void ConnectionFailed(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &ptr) {
01226   cerr << "Connection: " << (*ptr).connection << "failed.\n";
01227   debug(1) << "tcp_module: Connection: " << (*ptr).connection << " failed.\n";
01228 
01229   SockRequestResponse repl;
01230   repl.type=WRITE;
01231   repl.connection=(*ptr).connection;
01232   repl.bytes=0;
01233   repl.error=ECONN_FAILED;
01234   MinetSend(sock,repl);
01235 
01236   //Remove connection
01237   cerr << "Erasing connection: " << *ptr << endl << endl;
01238   clist.erase(ptr);
01239   PrintConnectionList();
01240 }
01241 
01242 // General functions
01243 unsigned UpdateSequenceNumber(Time &current_time, Time &seqtime, unsigned num) {
01244   // Update the sequence number from current time
01245   num += ((current_time.tv_usec - seqtime.tv_usec)
01246           * MICROSEC_MULTIPLIER) & SEQ_LENGTH_MASK;
01247   num += ((current_time.tv_sec - seqtime.tv_sec)
01248           * SECOND_MULTIPLIER) & SEQ_LENGTH_MASK;
01249   seqtime = current_time;
01250   return num;
01251 }
01252 
01253 bool GetNextTimeoutValue(Time &current_time, Time &select_timeout) {
01254   Time zero_time(0,0);
01255   bool tmractive=false;
01256 
01257   PrintConnectionList();
01258 
01259   // Find earliest expiring timer in the connection list
01260   ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator earliest = clist.FindEarliest();
01261   if (earliest != clist.end()) {
01262     if ((*earliest).timeout < current_time) {
01263       select_timeout = zero_time; // Timeout immediately
01264       tmractive=true;
01265     } else {
01266       // There is an active timer in connection list
01267       double t = (double)(*earliest).timeout - (double)current_time;
01268       select_timeout = t;
01269       tmractive = true;
01270     }
01271   }
01272   return tmractive;
01273 }
01274 
01275 void PrintConnectionList() {
01276   cerr << "The connection list: " << endl;
01277   ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator iter = clist.begin();
01278   while (iter != clist.end()) {
01279     cerr << *iter << endl << endl;
01280     iter++;
01281   }
01282 }
01283 
01284 // Packet creation functions
01285 Packet CreatePacket(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &ptr, unsigned char flags)
01286 {
01287   //Create a SYN packet
01288   Packet p;
01289 
01290   //Build IP header info
01291   IPHeader ih;
01292   ih.SetProtocol(IP_PROTO_TCP);
01293   ih.SetSourceIP((*ptr).connection.src);
01294   ih.SetDestIP((*ptr).connection.dest);
01295 
01296   if(IS_SYN(flags))
01297     ih.SetTotalLength(TCP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH + 4 + IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH);
01298   else
01299     ih.SetTotalLength(TCP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH + IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH);
01300 
01301   p.PushFrontHeader(ih);
01302 
01303   //Build TCP header info
01304   TCPHeader th;
01305   th.SetSourcePort((*ptr).connection.srcport,p);
01306   th.SetDestPort((*ptr).connection.destport,p);
01307 
01308   if(IS_SYN(flags)) {
01309     th.SetSeqNum((*ptr).state.GetLastAcked(),p);
01310 
01311     //Set the MSS length for the connection
01312     TCPOptions opts;
01313     opts.len = TCP_HEADER_OPTION_KIND_MSS_LEN;
01314     opts.data[0] = (char) TCP_HEADER_OPTION_KIND_MSS;
01315     opts.data[1] = (char) TCP_HEADER_OPTION_KIND_MSS_LEN;
01316     opts.data[2] = (char) ((TCP_MAXIMUM_SEGMENT_SIZE & 0xFF00) >> 8);
01317     opts.data[3] = (char) (TCP_MAXIMUM_SEGMENT_SIZE & 0x00FF);
01318     th.SetOptions(opts);
01319   } else {
01320     th.SetSeqNum((*ptr).state.GetLastSent()+1,p);
01321   }
01322 
01323   th.SetFlags(flags,p);
01324   if(IS_ACK(flags))
01325     th.SetAckNum((*ptr).state.GetLastRecvd()+1,p);
01326 
01327   //Set the window size
01328   th.SetWinSize((*ptr).state.GetRwnd(),p);
01329 
01330   if(IS_SYN(flags)) {
01331     th.SetHeaderLen((TCP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH+4)/4,p);
01332   } else {
01333     th.SetHeaderLen((TCP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH/4),p);
01334   }
01335 
01336   p.PushBackHeader(th);
01337 
01338   return p;
01339 }
01340 
01341 Packet CreatePayloadPacket(ConnectionList<TCPState>::iterator &ptr,
01342                            unsigned &bytesize,
01343                            unsigned int datasize,
01344                            unsigned char flags)
01345 {
01346   //Find number of data bytes for payload
01347   unsigned dataoffset;
01348 
01349   // TODO: Find a better solution here?  Seems that this was written equating size_t with unsigned int, when this isn't the case...
01350   size_t bytesize_t = datasize;
01351   (*ptr).state.SendPacketPayload(dataoffset, bytesize_t, datasize);
01352 
01353   char tempBuffer[TCP_MAXIMUM_SEGMENT_SIZE];
01354   (*ptr).state.SendBuffer.GetData(tempBuffer, bytesize, dataoffset);
01355   Buffer quickBuffer(tempBuffer, bytesize);
01356 
01357   //Create a data packet
01358   Packet p(quickBuffer);
01359 
01360   //Build IP header info
01361   IPHeader ih;
01362   ih.SetProtocol(IP_PROTO_TCP);
01363   ih.SetSourceIP((*ptr).connection.src);
01364   ih.SetDestIP((*ptr).connection.dest);
01365 
01366   ih.SetTotalLength(TCP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH + IP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH + bytesize);
01367   p.PushFrontHeader(ih);
01368 
01369   //Build TCP header info
01370   TCPHeader th;
01371   th.SetSourcePort((*ptr).connection.srcport,p);
01372   th.SetDestPort((*ptr).connection.destport,p);
01373   th.SetSeqNum((*ptr).state.GetLastSent() + 1,p);
01374 
01375   //Set last sent to next byte sent only if there was data generated
01376   (*ptr).state.SetLastSent((*ptr).state.GetLastSent() + bytesize);
01377 
01378   th.SetFlags(flags,p);
01379 
01380   th.SetAckNum((*ptr).state.GetLastRecvd() + 1,p);
01381 
01382   //Set the window size
01383   th.SetWinSize((*ptr).state.GetRwnd(),p);
01384   th.SetHeaderLen(TCP_HEADER_BASE_LENGTH/4,p);
01385   p.PushBackHeader(th);
01386 
01387   return p;
01388 }
01389 
01390 // Extraction functions
01391 bool ExtractInfoFromIPPacket(TCPHeader &tcph, Connection &c, Buffer &data) {
01392   bool goodpacket=false;
01393   Packet p;
01394   MinetReceive(ipmux,p);
01395   unsigned tcphlen=TCPHeader::EstimateTCPHeaderLength(p);
01396   p.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<TCPHeader>(tcphlen);
01397   IPHeader iph=p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
01398   tcph=p.FindHeader(Headers::TCPHeader);
01399 
01400   unsigned short totlen;
01401   unsigned char iphlen;
01402   iph.GetTotalLength(totlen);
01403   iph.GetHeaderLength(iphlen);
01404   unsigned datalen = (unsigned) totlen - (unsigned) (iphlen*sizeof(int)) -
01405     tcphlen;
01406 
01407   if (datalen) {
01408     data=p.GetPayload().ExtractFront(datalen);
01409   }
01410 
01411   //Check if checksum correct
01412   if(tcph.IsCorrectChecksum(p)) {
01413     //Grab the connection information
01414     iph.GetDestIP(c.src);
01415     iph.GetSourceIP(c.dest);
01416     iph.GetProtocol(c.protocol);
01417     tcph.GetDestPort(c.srcport);
01418     tcph.GetSourcePort(c.destport);
01419     goodpacket=true;
01420   }
01421 
01422   return goodpacket;
01423 }
